1036540.name: PaymoneyWubby: The Game
1036540.description:
With his streaming livelihood taken from under him overnight, the dethroned PaymoneyWubby must venture through various parts of the world to reclaim his fame and fortune alongside his friends and fans!
PaymoneyWubby the game is a collectathon action-platformer featuring the streamer personality PaymoneyWubby and his team of moderators and friends. Play through levels crafted around popular community memes and members with light comedy cut-scenes, interactions, and easter egg references to lots of your favorite jokes and cuts from PMW and his posts!
Expect mediocre platforming mechanics, under-developed combat, choppy storytelling and lots of (ironic or not) jokes throughout the experience!
1036540.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
